title: Commutative Property
text: Use the Commutative Property to get like bases together.
speech: Use the Commutative Property to get like bases together.
pacedSpeech: Use the Commutative Property to get like bases together.

title: Commutative Property Result
text: You should be left with $$\left(-5\right) m^4 m^{-5} 8n^6 n^{-3}$$
speech: You should be left with  negative 5 times m to the fourth m to the negative 5 8 n to the sixth n to the negative 3
pacedSpeech: You should be left with   negative 5 times m to the fourth m to the negative 5 8 n to the sixth n to the negative 3

title: Product Property
text: Use the Product Property for each base: $$a^m a^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^{m+n}$$
speech: Use the Product Property for each base:  a to the m-th a to the n-th   is equal to,  , a raised to the m plus n power
pacedSpeech: Use the Product Property for each base:   a to the m-th a to the n-th
, a raised to the m plus n power

title: Properties of Negative Exponents
text: Use the definition of negative exponent, $$a^{\left(-n\right)}=\frac{1}{a^n}$$
speech: Use the definition of negative exponent,  a raised to the parentheses negative n  power is equal to, fraction, 1 over, a to the n-th,
pacedSpeech: Use the definition of negative exponent,   a raised to the  negative n  power is equal to, fraction, 1 over, a to the n-th,

title: Simplify
speech: Simplify your ending expression  negative 5 times m to the negative 1 8 n cubed
pacedSpeech: Simplify your ending expression   negative 5 times m to the negative 1 8 n cubed
